channel.title: Special Bar Not Updating After Spec
channel.description:
Okay, so my special bar will do the spec, but afterwards, it should deplete after the special has been done, but it won't update the special until after I click on my special bar again, can someone help me?
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/clip0007.gif[/img]
